Class Theater

java.lang.Object
  Theater

public class Theater
extends java.lang.Object

The Theater class has to ask the Row and Seat class for avalible free seats and be able to mark a seat as reserved. Stores a list of Rows and a string for Name.

Version:
2016.11.28
Author:
Cory Fields
